title: The ‘Father of History’ and India in the British empire
itunes:title: The ‘Father of History’ and India in the British empire
itunes:subtitle: Professor Paul Cartledge reflects on the work of the Greek author Herodotus, who was born 2,500 years ago and is regarded as the first historian. Meanwhile, we catch-up with Dr Jon Wilson to discuss some of the big questions around the Raj &nb...
description:
Professor Paul Cartledge reflects on the work of the Greek author Herodotus, who was born 2,500 years ago and is regarded as the first historian. Meanwhile, we catch-up with Dr Jon Wilson to discuss some of the big questions around the Raj

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
